If Kaidun's army wasn't enough, now he has the Stalker Company mercenaries fighting for him.

The {@LinkCreature:32#9#Stalker Company snipers} have arrows laced with a terrible curse that makes them far more deadly. If we could study the arrows, we might be able to better defend against them.

If you kill any archers, would you bring back their arrows?
Great work. Now we can find a way to neutralize the curse. There must be a way....

The arrows shot by the {@LinkCreature:32#9#Stalker Company snipers} in the mercenary camp are laced with a special curse.

Please get me those arrows.
